title: Radisson Hotel Group launches new Meetha by Radisson stores in Borivali and Bandra
description: After its flagship store in Goregaon, Meetha by Radisson has now been launched in Borivali and Bandra. The hotel chain said the expansion is a testament to the Group’s vision of strengthening its food and beverage portfolio and driving innovation in India’s branded mithai (sweets) industry.
